work.summary: Breathtaking journey through the universe of distributed high-loaded systems :)

I worked as a back-end Scala developer and a project lead. Our team created business services and single-page web applications based on REST. Nothing unusual, but we used a functional approach, particularly Scala with Cats.

I worked as a software engineer in the integration team, delivering business-critical data integration between back-office systems and the enterprise platform. I ensured stable data exchange and maintained high system performance.
highlights: Developed and maintained reliable data exchange modules (export/import), ensuring uninterrupted data flow and stability of business operations.
Developed and maintained XSD schemas, ensuring smooth integration into BizTalk ESB without disrupting dependent components.
Optimized heavy SQL queries and indexing strategy, significantly improving system performance, data exchange, and business reporting.
Promoted automated testing practices within the team and helped colleagues adopt them.
